ContentSection.Title: Target placement — Nested container end at the same position

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
In the — example — below there is an element that generated another container (the tab) nested in a regular row container. The arrow markers at the bottom are displayed overlapping at the exact same position.

In this case, the markers should be "moved" up / down. The marker from the outer container (row) should be below the marker from the inner (tab) container.
